titles.title: A resolution designating November 2011 as "Stomach Cancer Awareness Month" and supporting efforts to educate the public about stomach cancer.
A resolution designating November 2011 as "Stomach Cancer Awareness Month" and supporting efforts to educate the public about stomach cancer.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Designates November 2011 as Stomach Cancer Awareness Month.
Expresses support for efforts to educate the people of the United States about stomach cancer.
Recognizes the need for additional research into early diagnosis and treatment.
